sqlMap.select: select member_id, name, pass, phone, email, address, nickname, introduction, birthday, charging_amount from member where member_id=#member_id#
sqlMap.update: update member set pass=#pass#, phone=#phone#, address=#address#,introduction=#introduction# where member_id=#member_id#
sqlMap.select: select auction_board_num, main_image_path, title, highest_price, end_date, hot_check from (select auction_board_num,main_image_path,title,highest_price,end_date,hot_check rownum rn from (select a.auction_board_num,a.main_image_path,a.title,a.highest_price,a.end_date,a.hot_check from auction a, basket b where a.auction_board_num=b.board_num and b.member_id=#member_id#) ) where rn between #start# and #end#

select auction.auction_board_num, main_image_path, title, end_date, hot_check, bid_price_amount from auction, auction_participant where auction.auction_board_num=auction_participant.auction_board_num and auction_participant.buyer_id=#auction_participant.buyer_id#
select end_date,highest_price,title from auction where sysdate>end_date and highest_price_id=#highest_price_id#
select title,contents,regist_date,send_id from message where member_id=#member_id#
select title,contents,regist_date,member_id from message where send_id=#send_id#
select conut(*) from where basket member_id=#member_id#
